meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>dark</kanji> <kanji>reef</kanji> is still a <vocabulary>reef</vocabulary>. It's just really deep underwater so it's kinda dark under there. Because of that it can also be called a <vocabulary>sunken reef</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
